nodes.name: Active Scanning
nodes.description: Probe external services to enumerate exposure and gather preliminary intelligence.

nodes.name: Spearphishing Attachment
nodes.description: Deliver tailored payloads through trusted communications channels.

nodes.name: Obfuscated/Compressed Files
nodes.description: Encode payloads to bypass detection while transiting defensive layers.

nodes.name: Command Shell
nodes.description: Execute payloads and tooling from interactive shells.

nodes.name: Access Token Manipulation
nodes.description: Impersonate privileged principals using stolen or forged tokens.

nodes.name: Web Service
nodes.description: Operate command channels through resilient web service endpoints.

nodes.name: Credential Dumping
nodes.description: Harvest credentials for reuse and expanded lateral movement.

nodes.name: Cloud Account
nodes.description: Maintain cloud presence by registering resilient service principals.

nodes.name: Data Exfiltration
nodes.description: Transfer collected data to operator-controlled infrastructure.
